hero.title: Hi, I'm Thivin De Mel
hero.subtitle: Aspiring Cloud Security Architect | Secure Web Developer

about.description:
I’m a Cyber Security undergraduate with a strong passion for Cloud Security and secure web development. I combine technical knowledge in networking, programming, and system security with practical experience building responsive, secure web applications.

From developing static agency websites to building dynamic e-commerce platforms with secure backend logic, I focus on creating solutions that are not only functional and user-friendly but also resilient and secure. I actively explore cybersecurity tools and frameworks to strengthen my understanding of vulnerabilities and defensive strategies.

I aim to specialize in Cloud Security Architecture and design scalable, secure systems that integrate security at every stage of development.

projects.title: Vinzeres – Web Development Agency Website
projects.description: Developed and deployed a fully responsive static website for a web development agency. Focused on modern UI/UX design, performance optimization, and secure deployment using GitHub Pages. Implemented clean code structure and cross-browser compatibility.

projects.title: Christopherz.lk – Dynamic E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a full-stack e-commerce platform with secure user authentication and MySQL database integration. Built backend functionality to manage products, users, and orders while applying secure coding practices and input validation to prevent vulnerabilities.

projects.title: Ceylon Logistics – Dynamic Promotions Management System
projects.description: Built a lightweight custom content management system using PHP and JSON-based storage. Implemented admin authentication, secure file validation, and responsive UI components including interactive sliders and modal features for service promotions.

projects.title: Digit Media Solutions – Corporate Website
projects.description: Developed a responsive corporate website with dynamic content handling using JavaScript and JSON. Built a client-side admin dashboard and optimized UI/UX for seamless navigation across all devices.
